text:
Thank you for the feedback I’ll let the team know you liked the experience.

It’s all custom. The Academy came long before the CMS gained the capabilities to fully run that system. If we were today going to build a new academy, it would very likely be built on the CMS.

<@U25C65C3S> and his team built an LMS on HubSpot I’m sure he’d love to share about it.

<@U0311T6GU1G> we build <http://HubLMS.com|HubLMS.com> which is 100% leveraged by HubSpot features. While some of the items in the HubSpot academy don't come “out of the box” all is absolutely possible. Happy to chat if you'd like
Sure thing RB I'll DM you.
